data.title: A Private Members Club & Hotel on the world’s most celebrated address
data.meta_description: Inquire Members This Way Steeped in a century of stories, and renowned for its distinctive style – at once understated, unmatched, remarkable and discreet – Fasano arrives in New York City bringing forth a unique tradition in hospitality, defined by elegance, design and impeccable services. HOTEL & MEMBERS CLUB Steeped in over a century of […]
data.text:
Steeped in over a century of stories and style, with a philosophy rooted in tradition, Fasano arrives in New York City joining a portfolio of 10 iconic hotels and 30 restaurants stretching across Brazil and Uruguay.

As the first North-American outpost of the Brazilian brand’s revered hospitality, Fasano Fifth Avenue embodies a legacy defined by an inimitable combination of elegance, design and impeccable services. In signature Fasano style, these characteristics are enhanced by the splendor of the landmark building it inhabits on the Upper East Side.

On one of the most coveted addresses in Manhattan, Fasano Fifth Avenue faces Central Park on 5th Avenue, situated between 62nd and 63rd Street.
